announcement.title: Fights of Z! - Battle Info
announcement.summary: Go on an adventure and fight many strong foes!

bodies.description:
This new event was designed to be fun and refreshing
compared to all the other present events.

{size : 24}{color : #FFFF00}{outline : #FF0000, 2}= Custom Stage Information ={outline}{color}{size}

{size : 23}{color : #3C89D0}Enemy 1: AGL Yamcha and Puar{color}{size}

- 75k ATK, 125k DEF, 5.5M HP
- Super Attacks twice / 4 Attacks per Turn total
- 55% Reduction

{size : 23}{color : #F4D03F}Enemy 2: PHY Tien and Chiaotzu{color}{size}

- 80k ATK, 150k DEF, 6M HP
- Super Attacks once / 5 Attacks per Turn total
- 60% Reduction
- Stun immune

{size : 23}{color : #FF5733}Enemy 3: STR Krillin{color}{size}

- 100k ATK, 250k DEF, 8M HP
- Super Attacks once / 6 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity
- Randomizes Ki Spheres

{size : 23}{color : #8E44AD}Enemy 4: INT Piccolo{color}{size}

- 110k ATK, 280k DEF, 8.5M HP
- Super Attacks once / 7 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity
- Coercion

{size : 23}{color : #27AE60}Enemy 5: TEQ Uub{color}{size}

- 120k ATK, 280k DEF, 8.5M HP
- Super Attacks once / 8 Attacks per Turn total
- 65 Reduction
- Stun immune
- Seal immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity


{size : 23}{color : #27AE60}Alternate Enemy 5: TEQ Gotenks{color}{size}

- 140k ATK, 300k DEF, 9M HP
- Super Attacks once / 8 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- Seal immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity

{size : 23}{color : #3C89D0}Enemy 6: AGL Gohan{color}{size}

- 120k ATK, 280k DEF, 8.5M HP
- Super Attacks once / 9 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- Seal immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity


{size : 23}{color : #3C89D0}Alternate Enemy 6: AGL Vegito{color}{size}

- 140k ATK, 300k DEF, 9M HP
- Super Attacks twice / 6 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- Seal immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity

{size : 23}{color : #FF5733}Enemy 7: STR Trunks{color}{size}

----- Base Trunks

- 140k ATK, 300k DEF, 4M HP
- Super Attacks twice / 9 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- Seal immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity

----- Super Saiyan Trunks

- 140k ATK, 300k DEF, 5.5M HP
- Super Attacks twice / 9 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- Seal immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity

{size : 23}{color : #FF5733}Alternate Enemy 7: STR Gogeta{color}{size}

- 140k ATK, 300k DEF, 9.5M HP
- Super Attacks twice / 9 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- Seal immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity

{size : 23}{color : #27AE60}Enemy 8: TEQ Vegeta{color}{size}

----- Base Vegeta

- 150k ATK, 350k DEF, 4M HP
- Super Attacks twice / 9 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- Seal immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity
- 10% Dodge Chance

----- Super Saiyan Vegeta

- 160k ATK, 300k DEF, 6M HP
- Super Attacks twice / 9 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- Seal immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity
- 10% Dodge Chance

{size : 23}{color : #8E44AD}Enemy 9: INT Goku{color}{size}

----- Base Goku

- 150k ATK, 350k DEF, 4M HP
- Super Attacks once / 15 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- Seal immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity
- 10% Dodge Chance

----- Super Saiyan Goku

- 170k ATK, 400k DEF, 6M HP
- Super Attacks once / 15 Attacks per Turn total
- 65% Reduction
- Stun immune
- Seal immune
- ATK and DEF Reduction immunity
- 20% Dodge Chance

---------------------------------------------------------

Have fun and enjoy the event. It took me a long time to design
and implement this.
Feedback:
